tool_description: Public Data Bybit. Cryptocurrency prices and charts. Derivatives, Futures, Spot, USDC Contract
name: Bybit
title: Bybit

api_list.name: Latest Symbol  Info
Contract  Info

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: Contract name

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: prev: prev page, next: next page.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of data per page; the max. value is 200, and the default value is 200

api_list.name: Order   Book
Latest Symbol Info By BaseCoin
api_list.description: Return all ticker info by passed base coin

optional_parameters.name: baseCoin
optional_parameters.description: Base coin. Returns all records with base coin. If not passed, it returns records with BTC by default

api_list.name: Query historical volatility
api_list.description:
The data is in hourly.
If time field is not passed, it returns the recent 1 hour data by default.
It could be any timeframe by inputting startTime & endTime, but it must satisfy [endTime - startTime] <= 30 days.
It returns all data in 2 years when startTime & endTime are not passed.
Both startTime & endTime entered together or both are left blank

optional_parameters.name: baseCoin
optional_parameters.description: Base coin. If not passed, BTC returned by default

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: Period. if not passed, it returns 7 days by default

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description: Ending timestamp (unit: ms)

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: Starting timestamp (unit: ms)

api_list.name: Query Last 500 Trades
api_list.description: Returned records are Taker Buy in default.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: default 500

optional_parameters.name: baseCoin
optional_parameters.description: Base coin. Returns all records with base coin. If not passed, it returns records with BTC by default

optional_parameters.name: optionType
optional_parameters.description: Call or put, required for Options

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: Contract name

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: Contract name

optional_parameters.name: limit

optional_parameters.description: API pass-through

Contract Info

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: API pass-through

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of data per page; the max. value is 1000, and the default value is 500

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: prev: prev page, next: next page.

optional_parameters.name: baseCoin
optional_parameters.description: Base coin. Returns all records with base coin. If not passed, it returns records with BTC by default

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Status, can be WAITING_ONLINE, ONLINE, DELIVERING, or OFFLINE

optional_parameters.name: symbol

api_list.name: OrderBook
api_list.description: Query order book info. Each side has a depth of 25 orders.

api_list.name: Get Public Trading History

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Derivatives products category.For now, *linear inverse* including inverse futures are available

optional_parameters.name: baseCoin
optional_parameters.description: Base coin. Only valid when category=option. If not passed, BTC by default.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 1000. Default as showing 500 pieces of data per page

optional_parameters.name: optionType
optional_parameters.description: Call/Put Trading type of option. Call/Put

api_list.name: Get Open Interest
api_list.description: Gets the total amount of unsettled contracts. In other words, the total number of contracts held in open positions.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Derivatives products category.For now, *linear inverse* including inverse futures are available

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description: End timestamp point for result, in milliseconds

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 200. Default as showing 50 pieces of data per page

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: Start timestamp point for result, in milliseconds

api_list.name: Get Risk Limit

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Derivatives products category.For now, *linear inverse* including inverse futures are available

api_list.name: Get Latest Information For Symbol
api_list.description: Get all latest information for symbol

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Derivatives products category.For now, *linear* *inverse* *option* are available

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: Name of the trading pair. If category is *option* REQUIRED

required_parameters.description: Derivatives products category.For now, *linear* *inverse* including inverse futures are available

optional_parameters.name: limit

api_list.name: Get Instrument Info

required_parameters.name: category

optional_parameters.description: Base coin. Only valid when category=*option*. If not passed, BTC by default.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: API pass-through

optional_parameters.name: limit

api_list.name: Get the Last Funding  Rate
api_list.description: The funding rate is generated every 8 hours at 00:00 UTC, 08:00 UTC and 16:00 UTC. For example, if a request is sent at 12:00 UTC, the funding rate generated earlier that day at 08:00 UTC will be sent.

api_list.name: Query Index Price Kline
api_list.description: Index price kline. Tracks BTC spot prices, with a frequency of every second.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 200. Default as showing 200 pieces of data

api_list.name: Query Kline USDT

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 200. Default as showing 200 pieces of data

api_list.name: Query Premium Index Kline USDT
api_list.description: Premium index kline. Tracks the premium / discount of BTC perpetual contracts relative to the mark price per minute.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 200. Default as showing 200 pieces of data

api_list.name: Latest Big Deal
api_list.description:
Obtain filled orders worth more than 500,000 USD within the last 24h.

This endpoint may return orders which are over the maximum order qty for the symbol you call. For instance, the maximum order qty for BTCUSD is 1 million contracts, but in the event of the liquidation of a position larger than 1 million this endpoint returns this "impossible" order size.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 1000. Default as showing 500 pieces of data per page

api_list.name: Public Trading Records USDT

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results. Default 500; max 1000

api_list.name: Query Premium Index Kline
api_list.description: Premium index kline. Tracks the premium / discount of BTC perpetual contracts relative to the mark price per minute.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 200. Default as showing 200 pieces of data

api_list.name: Public Trading Records

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit for data size, max size is 1000. Default size is 500

api_list.name: Query Symbol
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit4.p.rapidapi.com/v2/public/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit4.p.rapidapi.com/v2/public/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default value is 100. Max value is 200

optional_parameters.description: Precision of the merged orderbook, 1 means 1 digit

api_list.name: Get All Symbols
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit4.p.rapidapi.com/spot/v3/public/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Order Book
api_list.description:
Get the orderbook. Each side has a depth of 25.
Enable 500 orders for orderbook API.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Derivatives products category. For now, *linear* *inverse* *option* are available

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Optional value 25 or 500. Default 25.

api_list.name: Announcement
api_list.description: Get Bybit OpenAPI announcements in the last 30 days in reverse order.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit4.p.rapidapi.com/v2/public/announcement"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
